description:
Mikako Nagamine is in the third year of a junior high school when she is drafted to the UN Space Army in a war against a group of aliens called the Tarsians. As a Special Agent, Mikako pilots a giant mecha as part of a fighting squadron attached to the spacecraft carrier Lysithea.
When the Lysithea leaves Earth to search for the Tarsians with Mikako on board, Mikako`s boyfriend Noboru Terao remains behind. The couple continues to communicate across interplanetary, and eventually interstellar space via the e-mail facilities on their mobile phones.
name: Nagamine Mikako
